Image

Stores all the information relevant to one captured image from the environment.  This includes the patterns projected on the object when the image was taken, the camera that took the image, and the image data itself, in matrix form.

Properties

Patternslist of GeneratedPatterns; light patterns projected on the object when the image was taken
cameraThe Camera that took the image
datandarray The pixel data comprising the image
This class represents the light field generated by a projector.
Contains all information relevant to a physical camera.
